name: Sink or Skim (itch)
description:
Sink or Skim is a cute top-down platformer about rocks hopping from island to island, skimming across the surface of a vast ocean. Bounce off walls to gain speed, go to slow and you'll sink below the waves.

Follow me here:  https://twitter.com/Chef__Seth

https://gamesbysethjohnson.tumblr.com

Mac version soon
